decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number (s): GRS-GSK_HTA-L_D01-00_DR_0913 Rev 7 The Bakery Plaza; GRS-GSK-HTA-L-00-DR-0914 Rev 8 Waterfront (1 of 2); 15/327 Covering Letter prepared by Iceni Projects dated 18 November 2021; Landscape Updates Rev 0 dated 19 August 2021; 2137-01 Technical Note: Arboriculture Proposed Non-material amendment at Block 4, Greenford Green, Former GSK site, Greenford Green, Ealing prepared by SJA trees dated July 2021.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendments to phase 1a landscaping in relation to planning permission reference 184888VAR dated 10/01/2020 for 'Minor Material Amendment (Section 73) for variation of conditions 26 (Drawing Numbers), 41 (Cycle Parking), 47 (Non-residential floor space) pursuant to ref (164694FUL) dated 01/09/2017 for phased redevelopment comprising a residential-led mixed use masterplan incorporating residential; flexible commercial and community floor space, in use classes A1/A2/A3/A4/A5/B1/D1 and/or D2 including, a primary school and nursery; a pedestrian / cycle bridge across the Grand Union Canal; car and cycle parking; site wide landscaping and associated works, including highway works; following the demolition of buildings and structures on the site (with the exception of the original elements of the Grade II listed Glaxo House). (EIA Application) (Departure from the Local Plan). -  Amendment includes changes to blocks 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 with associated internal layout changes providing an uplift in residential units, along with pro rata increase in cycle parking spaces; alteration of non-residential floorspace; minor external design changes; and amendments landscaping.'
